presentation-product.disabled-in-preview-tooltip: This feature is disabled in preview

pending-quote.title: Your Quote Request Has Been Sent!
pending-quote.sub-text: Your quote request has been sent to {{ distributorName }}. They will adjust the pricing accordingly and send it back to you.

feature-customize-product-dialog.subtext: Describe how you would like your product to be customized or add from available options.
feature-customize-product-dialog.image-disclaimer: *Example image may not represent the exact configuration selected.
feature-customize-product-dialog.customization-placeholder: Comments can include sizes, colors, or anything else you'd like to customize.

products-artworks.image-size-limit: Upload a maximum of 10 files and each file has to be under 1MB.
products-artworks.image-type-limit: Allowed file types are png, tif, tiff, jpg, dst, eps, ai, doc, docx, txt, csv, pdf, svg, xls, and/or xlsx.
